description: Taste the tropics with a terrific turkey burger topped with juicy chargrilled pineapple. Try this burger recipe for a fresh take on a family favourite.
keywords: Burger,High fibre,High protein,Bonus,Mince,Quick & easy lunch,Low sugar,Turkey
name: Tropical turkey burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup continental parsley leaves, finely chopped
1 baby cos lettuce, leaves separated, torn

recipeInstructions.text: Place mince, mustard, parsley, egg and breadcrumbs in a bowl. Season, then mix well to combine. Shape mixture into 4 patties. Chill in fridge for 30 minutes or until firm.
Heat a greased barbecue grill or chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Cook patties for 5 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm.
Add onion and pineapple to grill and cook, turning, for 2 minutes or until onion has softened and pineapple has caramelised.
Top roll bases with lettuce, patties, pineapple and onion. Sandwich with roll tops, then serve with mayonnaise and sauce.
